title: Strengthening Service Quality Competencies: Trauma Nursing Simulation Education Using Computer-Based Tutoring

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply trauma patient assessment protocols with 90% accuracy.
Learners retain at least 80% of acquired trauma nursing knowledge two months after learning through multimodal content and quizzes.
Learners achieve a score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point rubric for decision-making skills in trauma scenarios through case studies designed in PBL (Problem-Based Learning) format.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
